config.directions: Move the slider to explore the timeline.

entries.content:
1st Civil War c. 88 BCE–82 BCE. known for:

  • Marius vs. Sulla
  • Two marches on Rome
entries.caption: First Civil War

entries.content:
2nd Civil War: 50 BCE–45 BCE. known for:

  • First Triumvirate: 60 BCE–53 BCE.
  • Rivalry between Caesar, Pompey, and Crassus
  • Political alliances
  • Cleopatra
  • veni, vidi, vici
entries.caption: Julius Caesar

entries.content:
3rd Civil War: c. 32 BCE–31 BCE. known for:

  • War between 3rd Triumvirate
  • Gaius Octavian
  • Mark Antony
  • Lepidus
  • Battle of Actium
entries.caption: Third Civil War
entries.alt: Battle of Actium wood engraving of ships on the seas
